channel.title: Is this a good idea?
channel.description:
So I've been thinking...
I want to make the economy for my server really low(GP wise) Let's say it takes a few days to make 2B gold. I want to divide that by 100. So making 2B gold in a server is like making 20M gold in mine. Let's say an item(dragon claws) are worth 500M, good price, yeah? I'd like mine to be 5M. Now let's say a usual NPC drops 50K on the ground, I'd like to make that 500GP.
I don't want players having to type "1,000,000,000(1B)" just to buy an item, having to to loads of math in other circumstances. I want my economy based lower than what runescape actually is..
I think it'd be easier for my players. You don't have to NOT play a server just because you can't make 2.1T in a server(2.1B in mine), right?

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:16, topic:476897”]Drop less money. Make monsters drop steel-adamant for alchemy instead of dropping Rune. Let Rune be a more “rare” drop and dragon armor a super rare drop.[/quote]good idea here

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Go with more money. One thing I’ve noticed when creating games is they’re more fun when you’re dealing with large amounts of something, like hundreds of damage vs a small number.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Drop less money. Make monsters drop steel-adamant for alchemy instead of dropping Rune. Let Rune be a more “rare” drop and dragon armor a super rare drop.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

if your looking for a method to define this ‘idea’, there isn’t one (could be, but no point). just change the prices bought/sold buy shops.

then do something like:

x / y = price

x = set price
y = amount dropped by npc’s

really not hard. i also don’t think this ‘idea’ would work, because at some point people are bound to reach maximum cash.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:13, topic:476897”]You have to understand how an economy works before trying to make one. I.E Supply and demand, and actual usefulness to determine the worth of an item. Rather than say “Dragon claws are 500m derp”, take into consideration how much gold is in circulation.[/quote]no, just no, dark cavalier is 200b, joke.
OT: what tc said its true…

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

You have to understand how an economy works before trying to make one. I.E Supply and demand, and actual usefulness to determine the worth of an item. Rather than say “Dragon claws are 500m derp”, take into consideration how much gold is in circulation.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

It’s a good idea… butt …

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

HcoJustin:

You can’t just make things cheaper, you have to make them harder to obtain so the items in demand will stay valuable and be a decent source of income for those willing to do it. IE: fishing food for pkers instead of buying it from a store

Agree or only sell raw food in store so you have to buy it from ppl who train cooking

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

You can’t just make things cheaper, you have to make them harder to obtain so the items in demand will stay valuable and be a decent source of income for those willing to do it. IE: fishing food for pkers instead of buying it from a store

Read full topic

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:8, topic:476897”][quote author=Slyte link=topic=595062.msg4190829#msg4190829 date=1356785564]

I don’t see the point in it. It just seems like superfluous work. Either way things would be worth around the same amount and frankly, I could see it driving players away. With the status quo of economies in most servers at the moment, it doesn’t sound very appealing when a player only makes 10-20K an hour (1M-2M). Just don’t give players 50M every time they steal from a thieving stall and you should be fine.

Yes, this is true, but, the prices of items would also be divided by 100 too. So dragon claws being worth 500M(5-10m an hour) is like them being 5M(10-20k) an hour.
Idk, I want to have a server more unique than others. Main reason I’m going about this idea.
[/quote]

Its proved that the most players like to have big amounts of shit (an example is the x10 damage in rs. Its only made bec noobs wanted to hit higher.)
So if you make the money making rate to 50k an hour. I think no one is gunna play it just an idea.[/quote]

Ugh…eh… this is when it comes to making that 9T money pouch then…

Read full topic

Idk, I want to have a server more unique than others. Main reason I’m going about this idea.[/quote]

Its proved that the most players like to have big amounts of shit (an example is the x10 damage in rs. Its only made bec noobs wanted to hit higher.)
So if you make the money making rate to 50k an hour. I think no one is gunna play it just an idea.

I don’t see the point in it. It just seems like superfluous work. Either way things would be worth around the same amount and frankly, I could see it driving players away. With the status quo of economies in most servers at the moment, it doesn’t sound very appealing when a player only makes 10-20K an hour (1M-2M). Just don’t give players 50M every time they steal from a thieving stall and you should be fine.

Yes, this is true, but, the prices of items would also be divided by 100 too. So dragon claws being worth 500M(5-10m an hour) is like them being 5M(10-20k) an hour.
Idk, I want to have a server more unique than others. Main reason I’m going about this idea.

item.title: Is this a good idea?
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:476897”]so you want an economy tougher than actual rs?

lol good luck[/quote]

Not tougher. Just “smaller”.
Think of 20M RSGP being worth the usual 2B RSGP.
All I’d have to do is divide everything(that I’d usual want as a set price) by 100 for this to happen.
No luck needed, just math.
